item.title: Click Here!
item.description: How to browse this site? Well, here you can find an index of indices, choose the subject that you want, and there you can find more info. Meta posts Create a Schedule Easily!, Watch this video first Semester 3 This semster was mostly empty, I had yet to start the site. Engineering Programming - CS204 Digital Design - EE232 Circuits I - EE241 Semester 4 Math for EE - Math215

item.title: Announcing the death of this site
item.description: Why? I don’t know :( thanks for reading.

item.title: Courseoffering's first beta release!
item.description: What is this about? Seriously? you don’t know about this? :) Well, I don’t expect you to. courseoffering has ~137 visits as the time of writing. I am too lazy to write what is already recorded, here you go. Success? nah, I have learned that people don’t like change. Future thoughts? I will continue developing the site for my own personal needs, for I don’t want to create a schedule manually.
